docs.title: Awesome DevOps Jobs

docs.text:
Contributing


Your contributions are always welcome!


Guidelines




Add one link per Pull Request.


Fill in all fields:Name, Website, Region, Remote


Website link should look like:
* [company-name](http://example.com/)


Optionally fill out a company profile under /company-profile


Keep descriptions concise.






Search previous suggestions before making a new one, as yours may be a duplicate.


Check your spelling and grammar.


Remove any trailing whitespace.


Send a Pull Request with the reason why the company is awesome.
docs.title: Contribute

docs.text: Add one link per Pull Request.  Fill in all fields:Name, Website, Region, Remote  Website link should look like: * [company-name](http://example.com/)  Optionally fill out a company profile under /company-profile  Keep descriptions concise.    Search previous suggestions before making a new one, as yours may be a duplicate.  Check your spelling and grammar.  Remove any trailing whitespace.  Send a Pull Request with the reason why the company is awesome.
